review_text: Design wise excellent, features are good too, comfort level is also good, but expensive. it should be somewhere in rang of 4.500 million to 5.00 million. rang is also not too good, with this price the rang should be at least 450 KM plus. price shall be such that it is affordable by most of middle class.
